item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

7/23/2012's location will be:
Kelly's Restaurant and Bar

Kelly's is an Irish pub located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments.  Irish wood work at the bar, a nice fireplace decor in the dinning room, and if the weather permits we may get the Patio. The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites and more common American fare.

Our Last Happy Hour at Kelly's was a Blast, and received Rave Reviews!  Lets hope for a repeat performance, and if it's nice enough and we get enough RSVPs we can be out on the Patio!

Specials:

A few Draught Beers will be selected that night for discount.

The owner, Patrick, puts out some food for us.

Please RSVP for this event to give Kelly's an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / contact your Listed Host from the Event Description. (In this case A.J. 315-345-9348)
item.name: Happy Hour - Kelly's Restaurant and Bar
